thread.title: Amazon to ban sale of rival video streaming devices
thread.title_full: Amazon to ban sale of rival video streaming devices

author: MAE ANDERSON
title: Amazon to ban sale of rival video streaming devices
text:
Amazon to ban sale of rival video streaming devices Associated Press | 0 comments 
NEW YORK (AP) — Amazon will stop allowing its third-party sellers to sell Google and Apple video-streaming devices as it focuses on its own Prime Instant Video streaming service. 
The company said in a statement that Prime Video has become an important part of its $99 annual Prime loyalty membership program and said that the video-streaming devices sold on the site should be able to work with Prime Video. kAm$6==6CD H:== DE:== D6== G:56@\DEC62>:?8 56G:46D 4@>A2E:3=6 H:E9 !C:>6 ':56@ :?4=F5:?8 #@<F[ )3@I[ !=2J$E2E:@? 2?5 p>2K@?VD @H? u:C6 %' 56G:46D] qFE pAA=6 %' 2?5 v@@8=6VD r9C@>642DE H:== 36 32??65]k^Am kAm$62EE=6\32D65 p>2K@? 92D 366?
